# Lowell Books

> Online Boutique Bookstore based in London, UK. Sells books and non-book products (toys, games, collectibles) via a private ecommerce platform.

## Legal:
- Company: Lowell Books LTD
- Location: London, United Kingdom
- Contact Phone: +44 7551 339174
- Email: hello@lowellbooks.com

## Metadata:
- Currency: GBP
- Payment methods: Stripe, Credit Card, PayPal
- Storefront description: "Online Boutique BookStore"
- Founding year: 2024
